alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 3:17PM EDT until April 05 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...East winds of 30 to 40 mph gusting as high as 60 mph, especially near the Lake Superior shoreline and in higher terrain areas. Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of one to three tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to strong easterly winds and icing. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact the morning commute. Strong winds are expected to cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
